trans-unit.source: The WCF Data Services class derived from <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebServiceHost" /> used to instantiate data services.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebServiceHost" /> 的 WCF Data Services 類別，可用來具現化資料服務。
[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 不是自發伺服器的實體。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the service is a component hosted in an environment such as the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) that provides core server networking facilities.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，服務是裝載，例如 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 提供核心伺服器的網路設備的環境中的元件。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, a service does not bind to and listen on a network socket for incoming requests to its Representational State Transfer (REST) entry points.
trans-unit.target: 具體來說，服務不會不繫結至和網路通訊端上接聽內送要求至 Representational State Transfer (REST) 項目點。

trans-unit.source: The host handles direct interactions with the network and support caching, scalability, and authentication modules.
trans-unit.target: 此主應用程式 (Host) 會處理與網路的直接互動並且支援快取、延展性 (Scalability) 和驗證模組。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] defines a generic hosting interface <xref:System.Data.Services.IDataServiceHost> that abstracts its implementation from a specific host.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 定義泛型裝載介面<xref:System.Data.Services.IDataServiceHost>，擷取它的實作，從特定主機。

trans-unit.source: This allows [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] to run in a range of hosting environments.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]在各種裝載環境中執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Hosting the Data Service](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/hosting-the-data-service-wcf-data-services.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[裝載資料服務](~/docs/framework/data/wcf/hosting-the-data-service-wcf-data-services.md)。
向主機提供 [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 的識別。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] defines a generic hosting interface <xref:System.Data.Services.IDataServiceHost> that abstracts its implementation from a specific host.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 定義泛型裝載介面<xref:System.Data.Services.IDataServiceHost>，擷取它的實作，從特定主機。

trans-unit.source: This allows [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] to run in a range of hosting environments.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓[!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)]在各種裝載環境中執行。

trans-unit.source: This interface should not be confused with <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceHost>, which instead handles registration and activation for the service.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面不應該與混淆<xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceHost>，改為處理登錄與啟動服務。

trans-unit.source: A default <xref:System.Data.Services.IDataServiceHost> is used in this case.
